text: "Pincushion" is a song by rock band ZZ Top, released from their 1994 album, Antenna. The song spent four weeks at the top of the US Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks chart and became a pop hit in the UK as well, peaking at #15 on the UK Singles Chart. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (1994) !Peak position |- |UK Singles Chart |align="center"|15 |- |U.S. Billboard Bubbling Under Hot 100 Singles |align="center"|24 |- |U.S. Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks |align="center"|1 |- |} ==Personnel== *Billy Gibbons - guitar, lead vocals *Dusty Hill - bass, backing vocals *Frank Beard - drums ==References== Category:ZZ Top songs Category:1994 singles Category:Billboard Mainstream Rock number-one singles Category:Songs written by Frank Beard (musician) Category:Songs written by Dusty Hill Category:Songs written by Billy Gibbons Category:1994 songs
title: Pincushion (song)
